name: Subway Driver Dream Emulator
description:
This is an experiment on translating feelings that I had when I was a child taking the subway train, in Paris's suburbs, where I grew up.

(the game is more a proof of concept than a finished game, enjoy)

This game leans more towards an eerie/strange atmosphere but nothing too agressive.

The game was made in few days for the LSDJAM 2021, celebrating the birthday of LSD Dream Emulator.

A session can last as long as you do not get bored, the game features some hidden stuff.

The game is best played with headphones, in the dark.

Controls :

WASD = Move

Mouse Wheel Up or Down = Speed UP/DOWN the train

E = interact

Credits :

Game by XENA_SN, additionnal pictures and cover Painting by BlueMintMilk.
